title: LP Pooling stability issues
body_html:
The gradient of LP-Pooling is undefined when the sum of all inputs to the power of p is zero. The current implementation will yield NAN in this case.

I would like to propose to set the gradient to zero in this case.

That would, at least, not produce a NAN gradient, which propagates through the network and breaks other parameters.

body:
The gradient of LP-Pooling is undefined when the sum of all inputs to the power of `p` is zero. The current implementation will yield NAN in this case.

I would like to propose to set the gradient to zero in this case. 

That would, at least, not produce a NAN gradient, which propagates through the network and breaks other parameters.
